title: Quick vegetable curry
description: If your aubergines are young and small, they may not need salting which makes this dish even quicker to make.
ingredients: 2 large aubergines, cut into quarters, thickly sliced
3 large, juicy garlic cloves, peeled, chopped
finger-length piece fresh root ginger, peeled and cut into fine shreds
salt and freshly ground black pepper
small handful fresh coriander and or mint, roughly chopped
